Class Translator

java.lang.Object
de.dei0.blockprot.bukkit.Translator
public final class Translator extends Object
Helper to quickly obtain translations from a config by a enum key.
Since:
0.1.10

  • Method Details

    • loadFromConfigs

      public static void loadFromConfigs(@NotNull @NotNull org.bukkit.configuration.file.YamlConfiguration defaultConfig, @NotNull @NotNull org.bukkit.configuration.file.YamlConfiguration config)
      Initialize the translations from given configuration and sets the internal locale to a locale, which is read from the configs themselves. If the configurations do not provide a locale, we instead use Locale.ROOT.
      Parameters:
      defaultConfig - The default configuration we use to get the default translation values.
      config - the configuration to load translations from. See translations_en.yml for an example.
      Since:
      0.4.6

    • get

      @NotNull public static @NotNull String get(@NotNull @NotNull TranslationKey key)
      Get the translated String by translation key. This will use TranslationValue.getValue(), so values that are not translated still use their default value.
      Parameters:
      key - the translation key to search for.
      Returns:
      A translated String or an empty string if not found.
      Since:
      0.1.10

    • get

      @NotNull public static @NotNull String get(@NotNull de.dei0.blockprot.nbt.LockReturnValue.Reason reason)
      Gets the appropriate translation for given LockReturnValue.Reason.
      Returns:
      The translated string.
      Since:
      1.0.3

    • getLocale

      @NotNull public static @NotNull Locale getLocale()
      Get the currently used for the current translator. This value is used to identify the translation file and might be useful for knowing the language used by this plugin.
      Returns:
      The locale of translations.
      Since:
      0.4.6

    • resetTranslations

      public static void resetTranslations()
      Clears all translations.
      Since:
      1.0.0
